jobDetails.title: Software Engineer - Java
jobDetails.description: We are looking for a passionate Software Engineer with experience in Java and Spring Boot...
rolesAndResponsibilities: Develop and maintain Java-based applications using Spring Boot.
Write clean, scalable, and efficient code.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Ensure code quality, security, and performance.

eligibilityCriteria.qualification: B.E/B.Tech/MCA in Computer Science or related field
